clusters.neutral_headline: NHS doctor suspended over alleged antisemitic social media posts

items.title: NHS doctor suspended over alleged antisemitic social media posts

items.content: The tribunal ruled the doctor's posts "may impact on patient confidence" in both her and the profession.

clusters.title: Good news for wild swimmers as bathing water quality improves
clusters.neutral_headline: Good news for swimmers as bathing water quality improves

items.title: Good news for wild swimmers as bathing water quality improves
items.standfirst: The annual figures from the Environment Agency show 93% of sites met minimum standards, up from 92% last year.
items.content: The annual figures from the Environment Agency show 93% of sites met minimum standards, up from 92% last year.

items.content: Tributes are paid to the renowned surgeon who carried out the UK's first successful heart transplant.
